alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lemhi County; Western Lemhi County (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued September 14 at 3:06AM MDT until September 14 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility of a half mile or less in dense fog and smoke. * WHERE...Shoup, Bannock Pass, Highway 28 Tendoy to Lone Pine, Highway 93 Lost Trail Pass to Gibbonsville, Lemhi Pass, and Salmon. * WHEN...Until noon MDT today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. Visibility may change drastically over short distances.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lemhi County; Western Lemhi County
